text: is a male former international table tennis player from Japan. == Career == === Table tennis === He won a bronze medal at the 1971 World Table Tennis Championships with Yujiro Imano and another with Shigeo Itoh at the 1975 World Table Tennis Championships. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Japanese male table tennis players Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Katsuyuki Abe
